mapper.update: update details set cumulative_cases=#{cumulative_cases}, active_cases_change=#{active_cases_change}, cumulative_recovered=#{cumulative_recovered}, recovered_add=#{recovered_add}, cumulative_deaths=#{cumulative_deaths}, dead_add=#{dead_add}, province=#{province}, ds=#{ds} where ds = #{ds}and province=#{province};
mapper.insert: insert into details(ds, cumulative_cases, active_cases_change, cumulative_recovered, recovered_add, cumulative_deaths, dead_add, province) values (#{ds}, #{cumulative_cases}, #{active_cases_change}, #{cumulative_recovered}, #{recovered_add}, #{cumulative_deaths}, #{dead_add}, #{province});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM details ORDER BY ds DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT sum(id) as id, ds, sum(cumulative_cases) as cumulative_cases, sum(active_cases_change) as active_cases_change, sum(cumulative_recovered) as cumulative_recovered, sum(recovered_add) as recovered_add, sum(cumulative_deaths) as cumulative_deaths, sum(dead_add) as dead_add, count(province) as province FROM details group by ds;
SELECT province FROM details order by ds desc limit 14;
SELECT sum(cumulative_cases) FROM details where ds = (select ds from details order by ds desc limit 1) group by province;
